channels.name: server-announcements
channels.description: Important updates, events, and changes related to the server

channels.name: introductions
channels.description: Introduce yourself to the robotics community! Share your background and interests

channels.name: general-discussion
channels.description: Open discussions about anything related to robotics

channels.name: industry-news
channels.description: Latest news, trends, and happenings in the robotics industry

channels.name: mechanical-design
channels.description: Discussions about robot mechanical design, CAD modeling, and prototyping

channels.name: electrical-design
channels.description: Share and discuss information about robot electrical design, circuits, and components

channels.name: software-development
channels.description: Discussions about robot software development, programming languages, and frameworks

channels.name: sensors-and-actuators
channels.description: Share and discuss strategies for integrating sensors and actuators in robots

channels.name: control-systems
channels.description: Discussions about robot control systems, algorithms, and architectures

channels.name: industrial-robotics
channels.description: Discussions about industrial robots, automation, and manufacturing

channels.name: service-robotics
channels.description: Share and discuss information about service robots, assistive technologies, and human-robot interaction

channels.name: mobile-robotics
channels.description: Discussions about mobile robots, navigation, and autonomous systems

channels.name: agricultural-robotics
channels.description: Share and discuss strategies for using robots in agriculture and precision farming

channels.name: medical-robotics
channels.description: Discussions about medical robots, surgical robotics, and rehabilitation robotics

channels.name: space-robotics
channels.description: Share and discuss information about robots for space exploration and extraterrestrial applications

channels.name: computer-vision
channels.description: Discussions about computer vision techniques, algorithms, and applications in robotics

channels.name: natural-language-processing
channels.description: Share and discuss information about NLP techniques for human-robot interaction and communication

channels.name: reinforcement-learning
channels.description: Discussions about reinforcement learning algorithms and their use in robot learning and adaptation

channels.name: deep-learning
channels.description: Share and discuss strategies for applying deep learning models in robotics

channels.name: robot-perception
channels.description: Discussions about robot perception, sensor fusion, and environment understanding

channels.name: simulation-tools
channels.description: Share and discuss information about robotics events, conferences, and workshops

channels.name: job-opportunities
channels.description: Post and discuss job openings, internships, and collaboration opportunities in robotics

channels.name: resource-sharing
channels.description: Share and exchange useful resources, tools, and materials for robotics research and development

channels.name: server-feedback
channels.description: Provide feedback and suggestions for improving the Robotics Hub server

channels.name: server-rules
channels.description: Review and understand the server rules, guidelines, and code of conduct

channels.name: role-assignments
channels.description: Assign roles to users based on their interests, expertise, or specialization

channels.name: moderator-only
channels.description: Private channel for moderators to discuss server management, moderation, and community issues

channels.name: bot-commands
channels.description: Learn about and use bot commands for server management, moderation, and user engagement
